refnamediv.refpurpose: Imports a CSV file into table.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Imports a CSV file into table.

refsect2.title: file_name
refsect2.para: Given as an input file_name will be parsed as CSV where it will insert into the table specified as table_name the lines between from_line and to_line offsets.

refsect2.title: from_line
refsect2.para: Default - 0, This means counted from the begining.

refsect2.title: to_line
refsect2.para: Default - null, This means counted to the end.

refsect2.title: table_name
refsect2.para: The table the data to be inserted into.

refsect2.title: trx_log_mode
refsect2.para: Default - 2. The trx_log_mode is used to do row auto commit and to log or not the transaction. The default mode is to do not log and do auto commit.

refsect2.title: opts
refsect2.para: Default - null. The opts paramater is used to specify the delimiter and quote. It should look like this:

refsect1.title: Errors
refsect1.para: If table is not suitable in respect of number of columns or type of columns error will be signaled.

example.title: Simple Use
